Terrorsaur/Megatron:





Terrorsaur poked his head in from the side of the cave. He heard KitKat call 
for him, and seeing that the others were assembled, he jogged over to them. 
He was hearing a solo flute play outside, which was something he hadn't 
heard before. Someone was out there.



Megatron snaked his head around to KitKat. "Is there a problem?" he smoothly 
asked, noticing her shouting.
